arStrings.szText: Reduces the Cooldown of {c_important}Leap{/c} by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds per enemy hit, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds. Hitting a Boss with {c_important}Leap{/c} provides the maximum reduction.
Reduces Cooldown of {c_important}Leap{/c} for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds per enemy hit. Boss hits provide maximum reduction.
